name: Pelican Elite Cooler 30QT
description: Toss your buddy a cold drink on day 3 of your epic adventure and reach instant legend status. From frontcountry to backcountry, this cooler can take it all. Pelican’s Elite coolers are made with the same injection-moulding technology used in their famous gear cases.Press and pull latches provide serious cold retention.Built with the same injection-moulding technology that has protected some of the most precise equipment in the world for decades.40% lighter than similar-sized hard-sided rotomoulded coolers.Freezer-grade gasket with 5.3cm of polyurethane insulation.Moulded-in tie-downs so you can cinch it down exactly where you want it.Side carry handles help with transport.4 cup holders in the lid mean fewer kicked-over drinks.Non-skid, non-marking raised feet provide sure grip on a number of surfaces.Drain makes cleaning easier.Integrated fish scale on lid.
